languages.text: Губернатор рекомендовала начать поиски ставки бунтовщиков с опроса подданных и свидетелей покушения. Допускается вероятность получения необходимых данных от участников сговора (вне зависимости от их витального состояния).

traits.locale_text: Губернатор приняла предложение о помощи и рекомендовала начать поиски с опроса подданных и свидетелей покушения. Допускается вероятность получения необходимых данных от участников сговора (вне зависимости от витального состояния).

languages.text: The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).
languages.original_text: Губернатор рекомендовала начать поиски ставки бунтовщиков с опроса подданных и свидетелей покушения. Допускается вероятность получения необходимых данных от участников сговора (вне зависимости от их витального состояния).

traits.locale_text: The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).

The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).

The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).

The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).

languages.text: 总督建议行商浪人询问仆人与其他目击了那场袭击的人，寻找叛军基地所在之处。或许可以从那些叛乱分子口中得到关键情报。哪怕是再不重要的叛军士兵，也可能会提供有价值的线索。
languages.original_text: The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).

traits.locale_text: 总督建议行商浪人询问仆人与其他目击了那场袭击的人，寻找叛军基地所在之处。或许可以从那些叛乱分子口中得到关键情报。哪怕是再不重要的叛军士兵，也可能会提供有价值的线索。

languages.text: 総督は反乱軍の基地の捜索について、使用人や暗殺未遂の目撃者に対する尋問から開始することを提案した。生死の如何を問わず、共謀者から重要な情報を引き出すことができるかもしれない。
languages.original_text: The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).

traits.locale_text: 総督は反乱軍の基地の捜索について、使用人や暗殺未遂の目撃者に対する尋問から開始することを提案した。生死の如何を問わず、共謀者から重要な情報を引き出すことができるかもしれない。

languages.text: La gobernadora ha sugerido empezar la búsqueda de la base rebelde interrogando a los sirvientes y otros testigos del intento de asesinato. Tal vez sea posible extraer información clave de los propios conspiradores (sin importar su estado vital).
languages.original_text: The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).

traits.locale_text: La gobernadora ha sugerido empezar la búsqueda de la base rebelde interrogando a los sirvientes y otros testigos del intento de asesinato. Tal vez sea posible extraer información clave de los propios conspiradores (sin importar su estado vital).

languages.text: Die Gouverneurin hat vorgeschlagen, die Suche nach der Basis der Rebellen mit einer Befragung der Diener und anderer Zeugen des Mordversuchs zu beginnen. Möglicherweise können wichtige Informationen auch von den Verschwörern selbst (unabhängig von deren Vitalstatus) gewonnen werden.
languages.original_text: The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).

traits.locale_text: Die Gouverneurin hat vorgeschlagen, die Suche nach der Basis der Rebellen mit einer Befragung der Diener und anderer Zeugen des Mordversuchs zu beginnen. Möglicherweise können wichtige Informationen auch von den Verschwörern selbst (unabhängig von deren Vitalstatus) gewonnen werden.

languages.text: La gouverneure a suggéré de chercher la base des rebelles en interrogeant les serviteurs et d'autres témoins de la tentative d'assassinat. Il est peut-être possible de tirer des informations des conspirateurs eux-mêmes (peu importe leur état de santé).
languages.original_text: The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).

traits.locale_text: La gouverneure a suggéré de chercher la base des rebelles en interrogeant les serviteurs et d'autres témoins de la tentative d'assassinat. Il est peut-être possible de tirer des informations des conspirateurs eux-mêmes (peu importe leur état de santé).

languages.text: Vali, isyancıların üssünün yerini arayışında ilk olarak hizmetkârları ve suikast girişiminin diğer tanıklarını sorguya çekmeni önerdi. Ölü ya da diri fark etmeksizin komplocuların kendilerinden de kilit öneme sahip bilgiler edinmek mümkün olabilir.
languages.original_text: The governor has suggested starting the search for the rebels' base by questioning the servants and other witnesses to the assassination attempt. It may be possible to extract key information from the conspirators themselves (regardless of their vital status).

traits.locale_text: Vali, hizmetkârları ve suikast girişiminin diğer tanıklarını sorguya çekerek isyancıların üssünün yerini araştırmaya başlamayı önerdi. Komplocuların kendilerinden de kilit önem taşıyan bilgiler edinmek mümkün olabilir (yaşamsal durumları ne olursa olsun).
